Detailed Description

template<typename HPTYPE, size_t COUNT>
class cds::gc::hzp::details::HPArrayT< HPTYPE, COUNT >

Array of hazard pointers.

Array of hazard-pointer. Placing a pointer into this array guards the pointer against reclamation. Template parameter COUNT defines the size of hazard pointer array. COUNT parameter should not exceed GarbageCollector::getHazardPointerCount().

It is unsafe to use this class directly. Instead, the AutoHPArray should be used.

While creating the object of HPArray class an array of size COUNT of hazard pointers is reserved by the HP Manager of current thread. The object's destructor cleans all of reserved hazard pointer and returns reserved HP to the HP pool of ThreadGC.

Usually, it is not necessary to create an object of this class. The object of class ThreadGC contains the HPArray object and implements interface for HP setting and freeing.

Template parameter:

  • HPTYPE - type of hazard pointer. It is HazardPtr usually
  • COUNT - capacity of array
